_header: Hail stern on the sea so bright
Subjects: Virgin Mary, hymns to; hymns, to Virgin Mary
_description: ‘Ave maris stella dei mater alma’ — seven monorhyming quatrains

Bod425.First Lines:
Aue maris stella dei mater almaHeile sterne on þe se so
                    bright…
Bod425.Last Lines:
þe holi gost wold of hem springþise þre haue oure
                    wurcheping
Bod425.Editions:
Heuser,  Wilhelm. 
             “Eine vergessene handscrift des Surteespsalters und die dort
                eingeschalteten mittelenglischen gedichte.” 
             Anglia
         29 (1906): 385-412: 411-12.
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             Religious Lyrics of the XIV Century.
